meta.title: Instant Kava
meta.subtitle: The fastest way to enjoy Kava – perfect for on the go or when you need it quickly.

overview.intro: Instant Kava is the fastest and easiest way to enjoy Kava. Simply mix with water, stir, and drink – no kneading, no filtering.

whatIs.title: What is Instant Kava?
whatIs.text: "Instant Kava" is a collective term for Kava products that can be consumed without elaborate preparation. Unlike traditional medium grind powder, which must be kneaded and filtered, instant products dissolve directly in water.

alert.title: Important Difference
alert.text: Instant Kava is not the same as Kava extract capsules or tablets. It consists of drinkable forms that provide the full Kava experience.

items.name: Micronized Kava
items.description: Ultra-finely ground root powder that completely dissolves in water.

items.name: Dehydrated Kava Extract
items.description: Concentrated extract from traditionally prepared Kava, freeze-dried.

items.name: Kava Concentrate (liquid)
items.description: Ready-to-drink Kava solution, just dilute with water.

preparation.title: Preparation
preparation.intro: Preparing Instant Kava is incredibly simple – hence the name!

steps.title: Measure
steps.description: Add the desired amount of Instant Kava to a glass or bowl.

steps.title: Add Water
steps.description: Pour in 200-300ml of water (cold or warm).

steps.title: Stir & Drink
steps.description: Stir vigorously until dissolved, then drink in one go.

alert.title: Pro Tip: Use a Shaker
alert.text: A protein shaker or cocktail shaker dissolves Instant Kava much better than stirring. Especially with Micronized Kava, it prevents clumping.

dosage.title: Dosage Recommendations
dosage.note: Note: These values are guidelines. Actual potency varies greatly depending on the manufacturer and variety. Always start with a low dose!

items.name: Mix with Juice
items.text: Mix Instant Kava with fruit juice instead of water. Pineapple or mango juice masks the bitter taste excellently.

items.name: Coconut Milk Boost
items.text: Use coconut milk instead of water. The fat improves the absorption of Kavalactones and makes the taste creamier.

items.name: Travel Portions
items.text: Pre-portion Instant Kava into small zip bags. This way, you always have the right amount with you on the go.

items.name: Enjoy Cold
items.text: Instant Kava often tastes better cold than warm. Mix it with cold water and a few ice cubes for a refreshing drink.

alert.title: Caution with Micronized Kava
alert.text: Micronized Kava contains all plant fibers and can cause stomach issues in sensitive individuals. If you experience nausea, switch to dehydrated extract or traditional preparation.
